Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the appropriate committee of the City Council to hold hearings on the thirteen percent increase in traffic fatalities from 1998 to 1999, and the enforcement by the New York City police department to ensure on-street safety for bicyclists, pedestrians and other roadway users.

Resolution calling upon the appropriate committee of the City Council to hold hearings on the thirteen percent increase in traffic fatalities from 1998 to 1999, and the enforcement by the New York City police department to ensure on-street safety for bicyclists, pedestrians and other roadway users.

Resolution pursuant to Section 19-511.1 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York to review six determinations by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve applications for the renewal of a license to operate a base station and to review two determinations by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve applications for a license to operate a new base station.
